mapper.sql: KuGo_mv.id as id, KuGo_mv.mv_name as mv_name, KuGo_mv.mv_hash as mv_hash, KuGo_mv.hc_url as hc_url, KuGo_mv.hd_url as hd_url, KuGo_mv.bd_url as bd_url, KuGo_mv.head_image as head_image, KuGo_mv.update_time as update_time, KuGo_mv.class_name as class_name
mapper.select: select from KuGo_mv where KuGo_mv.mv_name like concat(#{mvName},'%')
mapper.update: update KuGo_mv set update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
